snippet: Astoria Cove on the East River in Queens is an example of Mayor Bill de Blasio’s commitment to create or save 200,000 affordable apartments in 10 years.
abstract: Editorial holds Astoria Cove on the East River in Queens is an example of New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio’s commitment to create or save 200,000 affordable apartments in 10 years; points out Alma Realty's 1,700-apartment development, with other amenities, is first to opt into administration's inclusionary-zoning program.
lead_paragraph: Astoria Cove on the East River in Queens is an example of Mayor Bill de Blasio’s commitment to create or save 200,000 affordable apartments in 10 years.

headline.main: A New Model for Affordable Housing
headline.print_headline: A New Model for Affordable Housing
